mapper.insert: insert into t_user_friend(main_user_id, friend_user_id, create_time) values(#{mainId}, #{friendId}, sysdate())
mapper.update: update t_user_friend set remark_name = #{remarkName}, group_name = #{groupName}, modify_time = sysdate() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id as id, main_user_id as mainUserId, friend_user_id as friendUserId, remark_name as remarkName, group_name as groupName, create_time as createTime, modify_time as modifyTime from t_user_friend where main_user_id = #{mainUserId} and friend_user_id = #{friendUserId}
